verses.text_plain: And it came to pass after these things, that one told Joseph, Behold, thy father is sick: and he took with him his two sons, Manasseh and Ephraim.
verses.verse_html: 1And it came to pass after these things, that one told Joseph, Behold, thy father is sick: and he took with him his two sons, Manasseh and Ephraim.

tokens.text: And it came to pass after

verses.text_plain: And one told Jacob, and said, Behold, thy son Joseph cometh unto thee: and Israel strengthened himself, and sat upon the bed.
verses.verse_html: 2And one told Jacob, and said, Behold, thy son Joseph cometh unto thee: and Israel strengthened himself, and sat upon the bed.

verses.text_plain: And Jacob said unto Joseph, God Almighty appeared unto me at Luz in the land of Canaan, and blessed me,
verses.verse_html: 3And Jacob said unto Joseph, God Almighty appeared unto me at Luz in the land of Canaan, and blessed me,

verses.text_plain: And said unto me, Behold, I will make thee fruitful, and multiply thee, and I will make of thee a multitude of people; and will give this land to thy seed after thee for an everlasting possession.
verses.verse_html: 4And said unto me, Behold, I will make thee fruitful, and multiply thee, and I will make of thee a multitude of people; and will give this land to thy seed after thee for an everlasting possession.

tokens.text: unto me, Behold, I will make thee fruitful

verses.text_plain: And now thy two sons, Ephraim and Manasseh, which were born unto thee in the land of Egypt before I came unto thee into Egypt, are mine; as Reuben and Simeon, they shall be mine.
verses.verse_html: 5And now thy two sons, Ephraim and Manasseh, which were born unto thee in the land of Egypt before I came unto thee into Egypt, are mine; as Reuben and Simeon, they shall be mine.

verses.text_plain: And thy issue, which thou begettest after them, shall be thine, and shall be called after the name of their brethren in their inheritance.
verses.verse_html: 6And thy issue, which thou begettest after them, shall be thine, and shall be called after the name of their brethren in their inheritance.

verses.text_plain: And as for me, when I came from Padan, Rachel died by me in the land of Canaan in the way, when yet there was but a little way to come unto Ephrath: and I buried her there in the way of Ephrath; the same is Bethlehem.
verses.verse_html: 7And as for me, when I came from Padan, Rachel died by me in the land of Canaan in the way, when yet there was but a little way to come unto Ephrath: and I buried her there in the way of Ephrath; the same is Bethlehem.

tokens.text: And as for me, when I came

verses.text_plain: And Israel beheld Josephs sons, and said, Who are these?
verses.verse_html: 8And Israel beheld Josephs sons, and said, Who are these?

verses.text_plain: And Joseph said unto his father, They are my sons, whom God hath given me in this place. And he said, Bring them, I pray thee, unto me, and I will bless them.
verses.verse_html: 9And Joseph said unto his father, They are my sons, whom God hath given me in this place. And he said, Bring them, I pray thee, unto me, and I will bless them.

tokens.text: I pray thee, unto me, and I will bless

verses.text_plain: Now the eyes of Israel were dim for age, so that he could not see. And he brought them near unto him; and he kissed them, and embraced them.
verses.verse_html:
10Now the eyes of Israel were dim for age, so that he could not see. And he brought them near unto him; and he kissed them, and embraced them.
 dim: Heb. heavy

verses.text_plain: And Israel said unto Joseph, I had not thought to see thy face: and, lo, God hath shewed me also thy seed.
verses.verse_html: 11And Israel said unto Joseph, I had not thought to see thy face: and, lo, God hath shewed me also thy seed.

verses.text_plain: And Joseph brought them out from between his knees, and he bowed himself with his face to the earth.
verses.verse_html: 12And Joseph brought them out from between his knees, and he bowed himself with his face to the earth.

verses.text_plain: And Joseph took them both, Ephraim in his right hand toward Israels left hand, and Manasseh in his left hand toward Israels right hand, and brought them near unto him.
verses.verse_html: 13And Joseph took them both, Ephraim in his right hand toward Israels left hand, and Manasseh in his left hand toward Israels right hand, and brought them near unto him.

verses.text_plain: And Israel stretched out his right hand, and laid it upon Ephraims head, who was the younger, and his left hand upon Manassehs head, guiding his hands wittingly; for Manasseh was the firstborn.
verses.verse_html: 14And Israel stretched out his right hand, and laid it upon Ephraims head, who was the younger, and his left hand upon Manassehs head, guiding his hands wittingly; for Manasseh was the firstborn.

verses.text_plain: And he blessed Joseph, and said, God, before whom my fathers Abraham and Isaac did walk, the God which fed me all my life long unto this day,
verses.verse_html: 15And he blessed Joseph, and said, God, before whom my fathers Abraham and Isaac did walk, the God which fed me all my life long unto this day,

verses.text_plain: The Angel which redeemed me from all evil, bless the lads; and let my name be named on them, and the name of my fathers Abraham and Isaac; and let them grow into a multitude in the midst of the earth.
verses.verse_html:
16The Angel which redeemed me from all evil, bless the lads; and let my name be named on them, and the name of my fathers Abraham and Isaac; and let them grow into a multitude in the midst of the earth.
 grow: Heb. as fishes do increase

footnotes.body_text: grow: Heb. as fishes do increase
footnotes.body_html: grow: Heb. as fishes do increase

verses.text_plain: And when Joseph saw that his father laid his right hand upon the head of Ephraim, it displeased him: and he held up his fathers hand, to remove it from Ephraims head unto Manassehs head.
verses.verse_html:
17And when Joseph saw that his father laid his right hand upon the head of Ephraim, it displeased him: and he held up his fathers hand, to remove it from Ephraims head unto Manassehs head.
 displeased: was evil in his eyes

footnotes.body_text: displeased: was evil in his eyes
footnotes.body_html: displeased: was evil in his eyes

verses.text_plain: And Joseph said unto his father, Not so, my father: for this is the firstborn; put thy right hand upon his head.
verses.verse_html: 18And Joseph said unto his father, Not so, my father: for this is the firstborn; put thy right hand upon his head.

verses.text_plain: And his father refused, and said, I know it, my son, I know it: he also shall become a people, and he also shall be great: but truly his younger brother shall be greater than he, and his seed shall become a multitude of nations.
verses.verse_html:
19And his father refused, and said, I know it, my son, I know it: he also shall become a people, and he also shall be great: but truly his younger brother shall be greater than he, and his seed shall become a multitude of nations.
 multitude: Heb. fulness

tokens.text: he also shall become a people
and he also shall be great

verses.text_plain: And he blessed them that day, saying, In thee shall Israel bless, saying, God make thee as Ephraim and as Manasseh: and he set Ephraim before Manasseh.
verses.verse_html: 20And he blessed them that day, saying, In thee shall Israel bless, saying, God make thee as Ephraim and as Manasseh: and he set Ephraim before Manasseh.

verses.text_plain: And Israel said unto Joseph, Behold, I die: but God shall be with you, and bring you again unto the land of your fathers.
verses.verse_html: 21And Israel said unto Joseph, Behold, I die: but God shall be with you, and bring you again unto the land of your fathers.

tokens.text: shall be with you, and bring you again

verses.text_plain: Moreover I have given to thee one portion above thy brethren, which I took out of the hand of the Amorite with my sword and with my bow.
verses.verse_html: 22Moreover I have given to thee one portion above thy brethren, which I took out of the hand of the Amorite with my sword and with my bow.
